程序包 cms.utils

类 SqlScriptRunner

java.lang.Object
cms.utils.SqlScriptRunner
public class SqlScriptRunner extends Object
导入SQL工具 提取自mybatis-3.4.1 org.apache.ibatis.jdbc.ScriptRunner ScriptRunner runner = new ScriptRunner(conn);
